client.application

Class ScotlandYardGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.application.ScotlandYardGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ScotlandYardGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A class that runs on a new Thread and starts a new instance of the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScotlandYardGame(int numPlayers, java.lang.String gameName, java.lang.String graphName, ThreadCommunicator threadCom)
      Constructs a new ScotlandYardGame object.
      ScotlandYardGame(ScotlandYardView model, java.lang.String graphName, ThreadCommunicator threadCom)
      Constructs a networked ScotlandYardGame without a game save.
      ScotlandYardGame(java.lang.String gameName, ThreadCommunicator threadCom)
      Constructs a ScotlandYardGame from a game save.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScotlandYardGame

        public ScotlandYardGame(int numPlayers,
                        java.lang.String gameName,
                        java.lang.String graphName,
                        ThreadCommunicator threadCom)
        Constructs a new ScotlandYardGame object.
        Parameters:
        numPlayers - the number of players in the game.
        gameName - the name of the game - for the game save.
        graphName - the name of the graph file for the game.
        threadCom - the TreadCommunicator object to communicate between Threads.

      • ScotlandYardGame

        public ScotlandYardGame(java.lang.String gameName,
                        ThreadCommunicator threadCom)
        Constructs a ScotlandYardGame from a game save.
        Parameters:
        gameName - the name of the game to load.
        threadCom - the TreadCommunicator object to communicate between Threads.

      • ScotlandYardGame

        public ScotlandYardGame(ScotlandYardView model,
                        java.lang.String graphName,
                        ThreadCommunicator threadCom)
        Constructs a networked ScotlandYardGame without a game save.
        Parameters:
        model - the ScotlandYardView that controls the game.
        graphName - the path to the graph file.
        threadCom - the ThreadCommunicator object to communicate between Threads.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        The run method called when the Thread is started. Starts the game.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • endGame

        public void endGame()
        Called when the game is over. Updates the views and then returns to the SetUpView.

      • notify

        public Move notify(int location,
                   java.util.Set<Move> moves)
        Returns the Move chosen by the player. Also updates the views for the start of a Move.
        Parameters:
        location - the actual location of the player.
        moves - the List of valid Moves the player can take.
        Returns:
        the Move chosen by the player.

      • notify

        public void notify(Move move)
        Updates the UI after a move has been made.
        Parameters:
        move - the Move that has been made.

      • saveGame

        public void saveGame()
        Saves the game.
